Registry of Open Data on AWS

COVID-19 Harmonized Data

coronavirus COVID-19 life sciences

Description

A harmonized collection of the core data pertaining to COVID-19 reported cases by geography, in a format prepared for analysis

Update Frequency

New COVID-19 data is added twice daily

License

There are no restrictions on the use of this data.

Documentation

https://www.stitchdata.com/docs/integrations/saas/covid-19

Managed By

Talend / Stitch

See all datasets managed by Talend / Stitch.

Contact

covid19.dataset@talend.com

Usage Examples

Tools & Applications

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    COVID-19 Harmonized Dataset
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::covid19-harmonized-dataset
    AWS Region
    us-east-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://covid19-harmonized-dataset/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
